alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:43AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jo Daviess, northern Carroll and southern Stephenson Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 343 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Massbach, or 8 miles north of Mount Carroll, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Pearl City, Shannon, German Valley, Ridott, Loran, Kent, Mississippi Palisades State Park, Eleroy, Scioto Mills, Winneshiek, Willow, Stockton Airport, Albertus Airport, Bolton, Elmoville and Stephenson County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for northwestern Illinois.
